title: Project: Options Pricing and Greeks
content:
## Black-Scholes Model

Calculate the theoretical price of European options.

### The Greeks

- **Delta**: Sensitivity to price of underlying.
- **Gamma**: Sensitivity of Delta to price.
- **Theta**: Time decay.
- **Vega**: Sensitivity to volatility.
- **Rho**: Sensitivity to interest rates.

Using these metrics, traders hedge their portfolios (Delta Neutrality).
